br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.settings

Enum ReaderPosition


  • public enum ReaderPosition

    Position of Reader relative to screen unrotated

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BOTTOM
      Reader is positioned to the bottom of the Screen
      EXTERNAL
      Reader is external to device
      LEFT
      Reader is positioned to the left of the Screen
      NONE
      Reader is not supported
      RIGHT
      Reader is positioned to the right of the Screen
      SCREEN
      Reader is positioned on the screen itself
      TOP
      Reader is positioned to the top of the Screen

    • Enum Constant Detail
